quote: God Lord, give me strength. Please keep the local firefighters away from me. Keep me out of the path of hardened abs and tall men in uniform, for they are bastards, one and all. Amen
quote_letters: GOD LORD GIVE ME STRENGTH PLEASE KEEP THE LOCAL FIREFIGHTERS AWAY FROM ME KEEP ME OUT OF THE PATH OF HARDENED ABS AND TALL MEN IN UNIFORM FOR THEY ARE BASTARDS ONE AND ALL AMEN
